titles.title: Title-border with Sts Peter and Paul, Christ on the Cross, the Symbols of the Evangelists, the arms of Saxony

classification.condition: Used in: Außlegung der Epistelln un[d] Evangelien die nach brauch der kirchen gel, Johann Rhau-Grunenberg, Wittenberg 1522 (Title-page)

pageContext.description:
Title-border with Sts Peter and Paul, Christ on the Cross, the Symbols of the Evangelists, the arms of Saxony. Used as the title-page for Martin Luther's 'Außlegung der Epistelln un[d] Evangelien die nach brauch der kirchen geleßen werde[n], von Christag biß auff den Sontag nach Epiphanie' published in 1522 by J. Rhau-Grunenberg in Wittenberg.
[cda 2018]
pageContext.dimensions:
Sheet: 16.7 x 13.2 cm
[Exhib. Cat. Düsseldorf 2017, 197, No. 102]

pageContext.signature: Publisher's monogram at the bottom left '.IG.' (intertwined) and dated '1522'
